messages.title: BRITAIN IS AT A CROSSROADS
messages.content: THE TORIES ARE IN CHAOS AND OUR COUNTRY IS IN CRISIS

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour will give the people the final say on Brexit, with a choice of a credible leave option or remain.
Labour will end NHS privatisation, build homes people can afford, raise the minimum wage to £10 an hour and create a National Education Service.
Labour will create jobs people can build a life on, with a new Green Industrial Revolution that will also tackle climate change.

issues.brexitEurope: Labour will give the people the final say on Brexit, with a choice of a credible leave option or remain.
issues.economy: Labour will create jobs people can build a life on, with a new Green Industrial Revolution that will also tackle climate change.
issues.education: Labour will [...] create a National Education Service.
issues.environment: Labour will create [...] a new Green Industrial Revolution that will also tackle climate change.
issues.socialWelfare: Labour will [...] raise the minimum wage to £10 an hour

housing.content: Labour will build homes people can afford

images.caption: Labour will put people before privilege

leaflet.additionalNotes: Promoted by Jennie Formby, General Secretary, the Labour Party, on behalf of the Labour Party, both at Southside, 105 Victoria Street, London.
